consent.subtitle: Your health companion
consent.privacySubtitle: Before you begin, please review our privacy practices.
consent.trustMessage: Your trust and privacy are our top priorities.
consent.accessibilityDescription: If you need assistance reading or understanding this form, please contact us at privacy@loretta.care
consent.acknowledge: I understand and acknowledge these privacy practices
consent.newsletterOptIn: Keep me updated with health tips and news (optional)

insights.title: Personalised insights
insights.description: We use your data to provide personalised insights and support health equity.

documents.title: Document privacy
documents.description: Medical documents are deleted immediately after processing.

integrations.title: Optional integrations
integrations.description: Wearable and location data are only used if you choose to enable them.

security.title: Data security
security.description: We take appropriate measures to protect your data.

choice.title: Your choice
choice.description: You may opt out of research and withdraw consent at any time.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.message: Loretta is not a diagnostic tool. The information provided is for educational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult your healthcare provider.

accessibility.title: Inclusion & Accessibility at Loretta
accessibility.intro: At Loretta, we believe everyone deserves easy, respectful, and reliable access to health and wellbeing support. Our app is built to serve people with different backgrounds, abilities, and levels of health literacy.
accessibility.designIntro: To make this possible, we design our experience with inclusion and accessibility at the center:

points.language: Clear, simple language is used throughout the app so information is easy to understand.
points.navigation: Flexible navigation supports different levels of digital experience.
points.colors: Accessible color contrast and intuitive layouts are used throughout the app.
points.screenReader: Screen-reader compatibility is currently in development, and we are working toward full accessibility support.
points.identity: Respect for your identity is core to our work. You can always choose how you describe yourself.
points.support: Support is available if something is unclear or difficult to use.

accessibility.contact: If you encounter a barrier or need additional support, please contact us at
accessibility.feedbackNote: Your feedback directly helps us improve accessibility for everyone.

declined.title: We understand
declined.message: Your privacy is important. If you change your mind, we'd love to help you on your health journey.

notFound.title: 404 Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

noTeams.title: No Teams Yet
noTeams.message: Create a team and invite friends or family to compare progress!

waitingMembers.title: Waiting for Members
waitingMembers.message: Team members will appear here once they accept the invite and agree to share their stats.

chat.title: Health Literacy Navigator
chat.subtitle: Ask me anything about your health
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm the Health Literacy Navigator. I can help you understand your medical documents, explain health terms, and answer questions about your health journey. How can I help you today?
chat.error: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
chat.uploadHint: Upload medical documents (PDF, images) or ask questions about your health
chat.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Loretta is not a diagnostic tool and does not provide medical advice.

suggestions.sideEffects: What are my medication side effects?
suggestions.heartHealth: How can I improve my heart health?
suggestions.riskScore: What does my risk score mean?

calendar.title: Health Calendar
calendar.noEvents: No health events for this day
